channel.title: OK wtf is wrong with the servers
channel.description: ok theres is about 10-15 servers on the server list page that r working and they drop connection for me after about 15-20 minutes if that and i have no idea wat is going on...if u go info i need answer plz help out

item.title: OK wtf is wrong with the servers
item.dc:creator: @mightyman117 mightyman117
item.description:
@mightyman117 wrote:

yet still i know paladino does mess with it quite a bit but its been offline since about 8am this morning and hasnt gone back online since along with the server unitedpk in which both dropped and wat does dcing* mean? curious kinda new to the moparscape thing only been doing it for about 5 days[br][size=1]Posted on: June 22, 2007, 06:27:42 PM[/size][hr]umm ok ingame? where u mean that in rs?

Read full topic
item.source: OK wtf is wrong with the servers

item.title: OK wtf is wrong with the servers
item.dc:creator: @santa_pker santa pker
item.description:
@santa_pker wrote:

[quote=“hax3dup, post:5, topic:115262”][quote author=mightyman117 link=topic=164505.msg1534311#msg1534311 date=1182576161]
yeah i figured that but all of almost every server crashes at once? and stays crashed? oh and btw santa if u play battlescape can u still log into at this moment bc i cant and it happens to be like my favorite server…still looking for info!
[/quote]dude palidino updates the server alot and there’s an auto restarter, chill man, its usualy about 5-10 minutes…[/quote]Server was down for a dat dude…

[quote=“mightyman117, post:7, topic:115262”]ok wait r u answering the first question or the question about battlescape?[/quote]Hes talking about battlescape palidino is owner just to let u no pm me in game phoc if you need help

Read full topic
